actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for a ten percent increase in vocational and educational assistance benefits, and to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance regardless of the types of educational programs being pursued.

summary.text: Increases by ten percent the monthly educational assistance allowance payable to eligible veterans. Increases the period of entitlement for educational assistance from 36 to 45 months.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide for a ten percent increase in vocational and educational assistance benefits, and to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance regardless of the types of educational programs being pursued.
